name: Auto
description: Provides coverage for vehicles against accidents, theft, and other damages.

name: Life
description: Offers financial protection for loved ones in the event of death.

name: Motorcycle
description: Provides protection for motorcycles and riders against accidents and theft.

name: Identity Protection
description: Safeguards against identity theft with monitoring and assistance services.

name: Property
description: Covers homes and belongings against damage from perils like fire and theft.

name: Flood
description: Protects against losses from flooding, including structural and content damage.
